item.description:
I originally intended this for the day before Valentine's Day;  but I realized that I need to allow more time for sign ups, so we'll make it a Belated Valentine's day workshop.  I've been playing with cut out freezer paper, ironed onto watercolor paper, and painted over...the result is a vivid white image on a multicolored watercolor background!  It's a quick and fun way to make some instant Valentines...and we can have our own Valentine exchange as well, if anyone's interested.  Or use our resist cards as a basis for some jamming.  And there will be plenty of opportunites for experimenting with the technique:  On Beyond Valentines!

AMENITIES: Free parking. Table space and a chair. Access to some tools (paper cutter, heat gun, etc.). Access to a fridge, microwave, toaster oven, kitchen sink and restroom. Dinner in or out, if people are interested.

COST: $15 to help defray the Studio rental costs.

WHO MAY ATTEND: Any member of the NE ATC+ or Altered Art/Assemblage Meetups and their guests (18+ only, please).

HOW TO SIGN UP: These smaller sessions are often full with a waiting list. Reserve a place by RSVP-ing "yes" using Meetup's RSVP function. You may RSVP for a guest as well.

If your plans (or your guests' plans) change, PLEASE update your RSVP accordingly. Please do this right up to the start time of the event.

WHAT TO BRING: Most of the supplies will be provided (included in your cost for attending)  If you have favorite basics, by all means bring them.  But basic supplies -- scissors, glue, tape, blank ATCS, etc. -- are available for your use. Even if you show up empty-handed, we can get you started on projects.

CANCELLATIONS: In the unlikely event that we need to cancel---or even if we're just getting a late start--we'll post a message on the Web site and e-mail everyone who's RSVP'd "yes." So to be on the safe side, please check the Web site and your inbox before departing for ArtStudio 360!
item.why: It's the day before Valentine's Day! I've been playing with cut out freezer paper, ironed onto watercolor paper, and painted over...the result is a vivid white image on a multicolored watercolor background!

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: Freezer Paper Resist (with a twist!)
